- Color-coded timer: green \(>10 min\), amber \(5-10 min\), red \(<5 min or time up\)
- Auto-start timers when room detail modal opens

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
